title: Estadio Libertador Simón Bolívar
text: Estadio Libertador Simón Bolivar is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in the Tembladerani neighborhood of the city of <a href="La%20Paz">La Paz</a>, <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a>. It is most often used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches, on club level by <a href="Club%20Bol%C3%ADvar">Club Bolívar</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 5,000 people. The stadium was founded on the 9th of February 1968, and has been used for FIFA World Cup games.
